rationale: 'Highly Pathogenic' is used as a technical term before the virus name 'Avian Influenza (HPAI)'.
statement_text: Victoria was also the site of an H7N7 outbreak in 2020, the most recent of Australia's nine outbreaks of Highly Pathogenic Avian Influenza (HPAI) since 1976.
